lst.name: sentence
lst.str: It says that while many government officials and advisers are recommending further relaxation, "there are equally strong pressures being exerted to halt all such moves."

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Indonesia"s economic changes have been welcomed by the World Bank and international bankers as steps in the right direction, though they say crucial areas of the economy like plastics and steel remain highly protected, and virtual monopolies.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Indonesia, the only Asian member of OPEC and a leading primary commodity producer, has been severely hit by last year"s fall in world oil prices, which forced it to devalue its currency by 31 pct in September.

lst.name: sentence

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Indonesia"s economic changes have been welcomed by the World Bank and international bankers as steps in the right direction, though they say crucial areas of the economy like plastics and steel remain highly protected, and virtual monopolies.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Indonesia, the only Asian member of OPEC and a leading primary commodity producer, has been severely hit by last year"s fall in world oil prices, which forced it to devalue its currency by 31 pct in September.
